name: GW: Pixel Defender
description:
Pixel Defender is a game made for miniLD #59, theme "swapshop" using jPCT 3D Engine.

The goal of the game is to protect the relic in the center of the screen.

The upper bar is the resistance of the relic and the bar below is the blocks available that you can use to protect the relic.

Controls:

ESC: exit game.

Enter: start game.

WASD: move player.

ARROWS: fire.

Left Click: place a block.
